page.title: 06Employment.
page.content: { {Employment-largest. I.C.I.,Plant Protection Division is the largest employer in the district.The firm is presently building vast new accommodation to replace old wooden buildings which were the original offices at the army camp last used by the forces in the 1940s.Some 700 people work for I.C.I. in Fernhurst.It is the main administative and marketing part of the company which has research at Jealotts Hill in Berkshire and a manufacturing plant at Yalding in Kent.The company deals in a variety of agricultural products which are marketed all over the world.
